reviewText:
While this is touted as the best Israeli comedy ever, the jokes are not all that funny.  The humor is very obvious and predictable.  The situations are the kind of silly scenes you might have found in a 1950's or 60's American sitcom.

On the other hand, I actually bought these as an aid to learning Hebrew.  With both Hebrew and English subtitles, I find these very helpful in studying colloquial Hebrew.
Love this show! Love all the characters and wish they would do another season
One of the funniest comedy series of all time  played without commercials and your choice of Hebrew or English subtitles. Needs Zone 2 player.
great show, english subtitles are pretty good but could be a bit fast.
